name: Help! I'm Stranded!!
description:
Hello! I'm a beginner game developer and this is my first game and it is called HELP! I'M STRANDED. It is about a person stranded on an island an they have to escape by finding logs around the island to build a raft and escape.

If you have any feedback let me know!!!

Welcome to HELP! I'M STRANDED's game page. In HELP! I'M STRANDED, you find yourself stranded on an island and to escape, you must collect all 25 logs scattered across the island to build a raft and escape. You face the dangers of starvation and drowning. The game is set on an island with a beach and is connected to the theme of the beach in that way. This game is made for the https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again Game Jam.
